page.name: Step 4: Revising
page.content:
Ask learners to share their story with each other, using the critique protocol below. 

The writer will read their story out loud. 

After they are done, the listener will provide the following feedback:

  • I noticed... 
  • I'm curious about... 
  • The strongest part of this story was... becauseâ€¦ 
  • I think this story could be even better if... (one idea only) 

Remind both the reader and the listener that revisions are about making the point and purpose of the written piece come to life. During this time, learners may recognize and pick up on grammatical and punctuation errors but remind them the focus is about the overall flow of the piece. Detailed editing will come later.
